name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Volvo Penta, Mecc Alte, Sices - TTTT Global

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TTTT Global, authorized distributors of Volvo Penta, Mecc Alte, Sices supplying engine, alternator, controller, charger, parts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TTTT Global is Officially Authorized Distributors in Cambodia and Vietnam of the world most popular brands: VOLVO PENTA Generator Diesel Engine (Sweden), MECC ALTE Italy Alternator - Dynamo (Italy), MECC ALTE Battery Charger (UK), SICES Generator Controller (Italy), DEEPSEA Controller (UK) for all application such as: Diesel generator, Renewable energy, Solar power, Wind power and water power. We are looking for dealers with special cooperated policies. Please contact us for more information at info@ttttglobal.com
